description: A short lesson to help you apply Resilience Across Generations.

hook.text: If trauma passes through generations, so does resilience.

buildup.text: Communities with strong cultural identity and rituals show better trauma recovery.

discovery.text: Social cohesion and collective storytelling help process group trauma.

punchline.text: Healing, like trauma, is contagious across generations.

quiz.question: What builds intergenerational resilience?
options: Strong cultural identity and collective storytelling
